# selecting(_:)

**Instance Method**

Generates a data frame that includes only the column selection.

## Declaration

```swift
func selecting(_ selection: ColumnSelection) -> DataFrame
```

## Parameters

- **selection**: A selection of columns.

## Return Value

A new data frame including only the selected columns.
title: selecting(_:)
